title: Body Fat Calculator | Health & Fitness Body Metrics

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: U.S. Navy (measurements in inches, log base 10): Male: \( \%BF = 86.010 \cdot \log_{10}(\text{waist} - \text{neck}) - 70.041 \cdot \log_{10}(\text{height}) + 36.76 \) Female: \( \%BF = 163.205 \cdot \log_{10}(\text{waist} + \text{hip} - \text{neck}) - 97.684 \cdot \log_{10}(\text{height}) - 78.387 \) BMI-based (Deurenberg): \( \%BF = 1.20 \cdot BMI + 0.23 \cdot \text{Age} - 10.8 \cdot \text{Sex} - 5.4 \), where \( BMI = \frac{weight\,(kg)}{height\,(m)^2} \) and Sex = 1 for male, 0 for female.

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
